basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Joe Hight Award

description: This scholarship was established by the Dart Center for Journalism and Trauma to honor veteran journalist and UCO alumnus Joe Hight. It is awarded to a student who exhibits outstanding promise in ethical journalism. Eligibility Requirements Sophomore, junior, or senior standing Mass Communications major Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
